channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Yongyi Yang

item.title: Problems
item.description: This page is a collection of some of the unsolved problems during my research. Most of them are in a theoretical flavor but not necessarily a well-defined mathematical problem. Please feel free to conctact me if you have any ideas or thoughts about any of those problems. Problems The Role of Symmetric Transformation Related Paper: Transformers from an Optimization Perspective. In this paper we tried to explain an iterative process (e.
